thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 20 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Australian Shareholders' Association Comments On AMP Evidence Before Royal Commission

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Australian Shareholders' Association Comments On AMP Evidence Before Royal Commission

organizations.name: brief-australian shareholders' association comments on amp evidence before royal commission

text:
April 20 (Reuters) - Australian Shareholders’ Association:
* WANTS TO ASK CATHERINE BRENNER ABOUT REPORTED INTERFERENCE WITH PRODUCTION OF INDEPENDENT REPORT FROM CLAYTON UTZ
* TO ASK DIRECTORS TO STATE WHAT STEPS THEY HAVE TAKEN TO STAMP OUT PRACTICES REVEALED IN ROYAL COMMISSION HEARINGS
* IF EXPLANATION IS NOT ABLE TO BE PROVIDED, HER POSITION AS CHAIR IS UNTENABLE
* AT AMP AGM ON MAY 10, ASA WILL VOTE ANY OPEN PROXIES IT RECEIVES AGAINST THE REMUNERATION REPORT Source text for Eikon: [ bit.ly/2HOUnAi ] Further company coverage:
